name: TUNDRA - MVM 10 - Super edition Entry
description:
What Is This!?

Project TUNDRA  started as a small game idea I had while working on other hobby projects. Over time the idea slowly formed into something I felt I had to make.

I started working on the game as a submission for the Metroidvania Month 10 Game Jam, since it was a perfect fit for the type of game I want to make.

The MVM10 jam introduced me to some great people, provided awesome feedback, and motivated me to make something I was truly proud of. Now I am working to push it to the next level during the MVM10 Super!
